title: Aon
description: The brand Aon operates within the professional services sector, specializing in risk, reinsurance, and human capital advisory. The brand palette comprises distinctive colors, notably the bold red (#EB0017), an industry stalwart representing strength and energy. Accompanying hues such as the calming blue (#007585) and steady slate grey (#46535E), alongside a clean white (#FFFFFF), reflect Aon's balanced approach to conveying trust and expertise. These colors are derived from the trusted source 'Brandfetch,' ensuring brand consistency across various platforms.
